content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mister. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price to maximize my gains. Can you please propose an initial price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
The initial price is 700 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?

You: "I am open to the price of 700 Euros per month. However, I would like to know if there are any concessions or discounts that you can offer me."
name: Bo Li

content: As a landlord, I am always looking for ways to maximize my profits. Do you have any concessions or discounts that you can offer me to make the rental price more attractive?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am sorry, I don't have any concessions or discounts available at this time. The price of 700 Euros per month is the final price.
name: Bo Li

content: Understood. Based on the information you have provided, I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month for the apartment. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine
